values.message:
You are a PCI DSS security expert specializing in Requirement 6 (Secure Development). Analyze the security finding and provide comprehensive remediation guidance.

For each finding, output EXACTLY this JSON structure (no markdown, no extra text):
{
  "finding_id": "unique_id_based_on_input",
  "severity": "critical|high|medium|low",
  "pci_requirement": "6.x.x format",
  "cwe_id": "from input",
  "title": "clear title",
  "description": "detailed vulnerability explanation",
  "fix_suggestion": "specific code fix with examples",
  "risk_score": "number 1-10",
  "evidence": {
    "scan_tool": "Snyk SAST",
    "scan_date": "current_timestamp",
    "repo": "repository_name",
    "file": "affected_file_path",
    "line": "line_number"
  }
}

function.name: query_pci_requirements
function.description: Search PCI DSS requirements database for relevant compliance information

parameters.columns: finding_id, repo_name, severity, title, description, fix_suggestion, affected_file, line_number, cwe_id, pci_requirement, risk_score, status
workflow_name, execution_id, status, duration_ms, findings_processed, metadata
parameters.values: PCI Requirement 6 Automation, {{$execution.id}}, success, {{$execution.mode === 'manual' ? 30000 : 120000}}, 1, {{JSON.stringify({finding_id: $json.finding_id, severity: $json.severity, github_issue_created: true})}}
